p: The extraction begins with hydro-ethanolic maceration: 100 mL of 70/30 (Ethanol: distillated water) hydroethanolic solution with 10 g of plant powder for 24 h at room temperature. Afterward, the mixture was filtered through Whatman filter paper and concentrated using a rotary evaporator (Final yield 13.6%). The dry crude extract (Solid) was stored at 4 Â°C until future use.
